So, including both substantive and orthographic variants (except @subtype="case"), for 'app's a @subtype has been identified, corresponding to % of all actual variants (V)

The typization of variants was an experimental feature of this digital edition. A higher percentage of subtypes could be identified, especially for orthographic variants, by further improving the string comparison algorithms used, but these initial results seem encouraging. Please keep in mind that algorithms (Python software) tentatively identified types and subtypes for app elements, then I reviewed them one by one manually. However, the more accurate the algorithms became, the easier and quicker the review was.
